course_description: Students will learn the craft of research in economics. Coursework will consist of synthesis of literature; collection, collation, cleaning of data; data analysis, contributing to manuscript preparation, and/or other work related to the sustaining of an academic research project.
prerequisites: (ECON 220 or ECON_OX 220) and [(ECON 201 or ECON_OX 201) or (ECON 212 or ECON_OX 212)] or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 6575, Section #: 1, Type: RSC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: C. Fohlin, Status: Open
